channel.title: Poetry and the American
channel.description:
This series profiles notable American poets.,Twenty half-hour programs designed to further the enjoyment of poetry.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Things of this world
item.description: Discussion and reading by Anthony and Miriam Ostroff.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Social protest
item.description: Discussion and reading by Robert Beloof; and Eleanor McKinney of the KPFA staff.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Senior poets
item.description: An anthology of the poetry of some of America's major poets, read by Miriam and Anthony Ostroff and George Marchi.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: The American vision
item.description: A discussion and reading by Anthony Ostroff, Robert Beloof and Richard Deering.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Readings of Frederic Goddard Tucker
item.description: A lecture-recital by John Edwards, teacher at the University of California, on the works of Frederic Goddard Tuckerman.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Readings of Wallace Stevens
item.description: A lecture-recital by Don Geiger, poet and teacher at the University of California, on the works of Wallace Stevens.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Introductory program
item.description: Introductory program by Anthony Ostroff, poet and teacher, and director of the series.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Younger poets
item.description: An anthology, read by Anthony Ostroff and Don Geiger.

item.description: Discussion and reading by Robert Beloof and Don Geiger.

item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Death
item.description: Discussion and reading by Anthony Ostroff, Robert Horan and Robert Beloof, poets and teachers at the University of California.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Readings of Robert Frost
item.description: A lecture-recital by Robert Beloof, poet and teacher, on Robert Frost's work.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: Light verse

item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.dc:subject: United States--Poetry

item.title: American war poetry
item.description: Discussion and reading by Robert Horan, Anthony Ostroff and Robert Beloof.
item.dc:creator: Ostroff, Anthony, 1923-
item.dc:subject: War stories, American

item.description: A lecture-recital by Robert Beloof on works of Hart Crane.
